Positive Sentiment:
Scotiabank boosted its price target on MPC to $180.00 and kept a “sector outperform” rating.
Scotiabank Price Target Article
Positive Sentiment:
Barclays lifted its price target to $189.00 and assigned an “overweight” rating, signaling upside potential.

Wells Fargo Forecast Article
Neutral Sentiment:
Piper Sandler upped its target to $175.00 but kept a “neutral” rating, indicating limited near-term upside.

Barclays Price Target Article
Positive Sentiment:
UBS Group increased its objective to $203.00 and maintained a “buy” rating on the stock.
MPLX LP, MPC’s midstream affiliate, reported strong earnings and boosted dividend reliability, which may offer indirect support to MPC.
Wells Fargo & Company raised its target to $205.00 and reiterated an “overweight” stance.
Marathon Petroleum (NYSE:MPC) shares are moving today as several analysts raised their price targets and the company reported operational updates at its refineries.
